sentences.sContent: This report could spur some buying in corn futures when the market opens today.
sentences.sCn: 这份报告会在今天开市时刺激玉米期货的一些购买行为。

phrases.pCn: 期货交易所；远期外汇；外汇期货

trans.tranCn: 期货； 期货交易； 期货合同
trans.tranOther: When people trade in futures, they buy stocks and shares, commodities such as coffee or oil, or foreign currency at a price that is agreed at the time of purchase for items which are delivered some time in the future
